price: 先知啊！安拉准许你享受的，你为什么加以禁戒，以便向你的妻子们讨好呢？安拉是至赦的，是至慈的。
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ لِمَ تُحَرِّمُ مَآ أَحَلَّ ٱللَّهُ لَكَۖ تَبۡتَغِي مَرۡضَاتَ أَزۡوَٰجِكَۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu lima tuḥarrimu mā aḥalla al-lahu laka tabtaghī marḍāta azwājika wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
